Well, there’s lots of influenza around. I guess some people have rearranged trips if they came down with the flu. Seems odd so many of them would be on one flight. But seat maps are not a very accurate way of determining how full a flight is anyway.
"the virus" i like that better than coronavirus or covid-19
What virus? Influenza? Common cold? Norovirus? We could go on here.
Once, a long time ago, one of my computers *caught* a virus.CDC did nothing!Best of luck,Hunt
What virus? Everyone knows he's talking about the clap!

I don’t blame you for being concerned about the outbreak. 11 dead in Nevada. 2,900 nationwide. And that’s just through early January.https://www.usnews.com/news/best-states/neva…
Lol! 'The outbreak' is just as non-specific as 'the virus'!.
